summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 14 October to end of Thursday 14 October GMT
description: Overcast and dry on Thursday with a south-westerly airflow.<br/><br/>Any increase in particulates early on should disperse quickly as the breeze picks up from late morning.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
